```{r}
# Generating 100 image time series, with no change-point...
list_of_dfs <- list()
for(k in 1:100){
df <- array(data = NA, dim = c(60,60, 100))
for(i in 1:60){
  for(j in 1:60){
    df[i,j,] <- rnorm(100)
  }
}
list_of_dfs[[k]] <- df
}

```

```{r}
start <- Sys.time()
for(i in 1:100){
  test <- ABCD_img(list_of_dfs[[i]], k = 20, P_1_grid = c(1,4, 10, 15),
                   P_2_grid = c(1, 4, 10, 15), perm.p = T, B = 500)
}
end <- Sys.time()
avg_time_taken <- (end-start)/1
print(avg_time_taken)
```
